title: Supervention (2013)
overview: The film Supervention addresses all aspects of modern free-skiing. The company behind the film has previously won numerous awards within the genre and we meet amazing riders usually not on film, Aksel Lund Svindal and Terje Haakonsen.
storyline: A ski documentary showcasing modern freeskiing, free riding and snowboarding.
synopsis: Supervention is a documentary showcasing all aspects of modern freeskiing and snowboarding. Join an intense, fun and unpredictable journey together with the worlds most talented athletes. The stories are told told through travels all over Norway, New Zealand, Alaska and British Columbia.
